column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After a few visits to Jinya
column2: now I am convinced that I can abandon my ritual at the airport. I have tried their black tonkotsu
column4: and spicy umami miso and liked everything so far. Both the soup and noodle are robust. Also the small dishes
column7: chashu bowl were all pretty good
column8: though not too keen on brussel sprouts.
